dict.acceptation: 军事的；军用的；讨厌的；好战的；

sent.orig: Company to operate military connectors, military IC, military aviation and other military equipment socket.
sent.trans: 公司经营军用接插件、军工IC、军用航空插座等军用设备。

sent.orig: The website military academy has opened a military forum, where students can talk about military science.
sent.trans: 军校网站上开设了讲武论坛，让学生们自由讨论军事兵法。

sent.orig: West Point is the oldest contionusiouly opaque military continuously occupied military post in the United States.
sent.trans: 西点军校是美国历史最悠久的被连续占领的军事据点。

sent.orig: Reform of military training during 1981 was accompanied by a reduction military expenditure.
sent.trans: 1981年军事训练进行了改革，同时还削减了一笔军费。

sent.orig: Military exports must be accompanied by military export licenses.
sent.trans: 军品出口，应当凭军品出口许可证。
